A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Having strong female leads\, expectations being subverted\, I like all of that. Most of my favorite movies have that. The issue with The Last Jedi is it has plot holes\, bad writing and editing. If you put aside all the complaints about Luke\, forced characters\, Leia Poppins\, etc\, it still doesn't work as a movie. And it gets more evident\, given The Force Awakens did such a good job on those terms. The Last Jedi is a movie I wouldn't watch again.
